description: This file defines the ContactsScreen React functional component for a chat application, responsible for displaying contacts, enabling search, and handling contact addition within a React Native mobile app.

methods.name: ContactsScreen
methods.description: Main React component function, rendering the contacts list, search input, and handling user interactions.

methods.name: onSearch
methods.description: Handles user input in the search box, performs API search, and updates search results state.

methods.name: onAdd
methods.description: Adds a contact via API and shows confirmation or error alerts.

methods.name: renderRow
methods.description: Renders each contact row in the list, including avatar, name, status, and add button.
